title: FS: 1933 Babe Ruth RPPC & Matching Photo "SOLD"
author: jb217676

posts.post_title: FS: 1933 Babe Ruth RPPC & Matching Photo "SOLD"
posts.post_content:
Hi Everyone,
Available for sale is a 1933 Babe Ruth Real Photo Postcard & Matching Photo. Postcard (first photo) is beautiful, not postally used but does have a small amount of writing on the back. Stamp box is DOPS. The matching 6" x 4" photo (second photo) also has a small amount of writing on the back. The notes on the reverse of both pieces mention Babe Ruth was photographed with a fellow named Russell in the winter of 1933. An awesome pair in my opinion! I can get some back photos up later today. Price for the pair is "SOLD", PM or post if interested and thanks for looking.
Jeff

Jeff:    Just saw your collection.    Amazing!!!

Regards.  Phil

Thanks for the shout-out Phil

These Ruthian pieces are now SOLD!!!
